name: Frankenstein The Artpunk Prometheus
description:
It is true, we shall be monsters, cut off from all the world; but on that account we shall be more attached to one another.

The debate of who is the real monster in the novel/movie Frankenstein rages across the internet, but here we know the answer. Both!

Included in these pages are stats for both the Doctor and the Creature as monsters compatible with MÖRK BORG and Lichoma and as classes for MÖRK BORG.

Frankenstein The Artpunk Prometheus is an independent production by Michael Mars Gaming and is not affiliated with Bogfolk or Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG and Lichoma Third Party Licenses. MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell. Lichoma is ©2022 Strega van den Berg. All authors retain rights to reproduce, distribute, and revise their own works.
